nodes.text: Lower Markaran Outpost, originally Markaran Imperial Outpost, was an outpost of the Sith Empire located in the Markaran Plains on Balmorra. Lieutenant Thorpe, Fixer 66, Science Officer Garboza, and Toybox were stationed at the outpost. It was later taken over by the Balmorran resistance, with Sergeants Durren and Kejik stationed there.
